headline: Northern Trust Secures Expanded Mandate with Swedish Pension Provider AMF Tj채nstepension AB
summary: STOCKHOLM, January 14, 2026--Northern Trust (Nasdaq: NTRS) today announced that it has retained and expanded its mandate with AMF Tj채nstepension AB (AMF), a leading Swedish pension provider.
